feed.title: MSU Statistics Reading Group
feed.subtitle: Various tutorials on important techniques in topological data analysis. Tutorials made with the final goal in mind to use the R package TDA in order to actually implement each technique.

entry.title: 04/06: Selected Reading
entry.content:

Bayesian Nonparametric Longitudinal Analysis Fernando Quintana; Wesley Johnson; Elaine Waetjen; Ellen Gold Jordan Love
